  • Apr 12, 2020

    Set up a blog to document stories!

    …And we have a blog! To make posts, all you have to do is add a new markdown file to the _posts folder. Markdown is a super-readable markup language that’s perfect for blogging. Here’s a popular cheatsheet. This sample blog is hosted with Jekyll, which has great integration with GitHub Pages. However, you can also blog with Wordpress, Medium, or whatever floats your boat!
